Hello, I am Ciel Dean!

Aspiring Graphic, Web, or UI/UX Designer!

ABOUT

I received my bachelor's degree in computer science from Batangas State University. As a student of computer science, my interest in technologies makes me detail-oriented and has helped me develop a problem-solving mindset. My soft skills improved as well from experiencing internship and group projects throughout my journey to make me adaptable and cooperative.

As vast as the technology used in the world right now, I am kinda leaning towards designing because it helps me to be more creative and in a way to solve problems in understanding the needs and different perspectives that impacts people. As a student, I was mostly assigned in designing in group projects and even in the internship. Looking forward, I am eager to deepen my understanding of user design principles to create a visually appealing and improved functional designs that enhances user experience.

PROJECTS

Mobile UI Design

Food Expiration Tracker

Short Description

×

Food Expiration Tracker

Mobile UI Design

This design is created for a school project in our subject Technopreneurship. We, students are tasked with creating a ideation table and one of the requirements is to create a mobile design based on our choosen topic. This task involves finding solution to a specific problem related to Sustainable Development Goals.


This idea is developed to contribute to the Sustainable Development Goal 12: Responsible Consumption and Production. Here is the overview of the pages within the design, each are accompanied with brief description. Home page involves an interface that provides information about what the project is all about. Login Page and Signup page shows the functionality of ensuring security for the provided users. Profile Page serves as a platform within the project that enables users to create and manage their profile. Scan page refers to the process of scanning of information from food products with the use of the app. Main page consists of the products and information related on tracking the food expiration dates. The Add food page is a specific feature of allowing users to input or add information about the food item. Premium page is designed to provide additional features for the near future.

Technologies

Figma
